titles.title: A bill for the relief of Jose Alberto Martinez Moreno, Micaela Lopez Martinez, and Adilene Martinez.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6960)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
5/25/2007--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Jose Alberto Martinez Moreno, Micaela Lopez Martinez, and Adilene Martinez.
